answers.answer: Yes, you are right. Eating healthy for diabetes will help keep him healthy to fight the cancer. Best of luck.

question: My husband is diagnosed as bladder cancer recently. Fortunately it is an early stage he said. But he has a high blood pressure and a diabetes and he has been taking the pills for the high blood pressure for 4 years.  Is all the good foods for the cancer also good for the diabetes as well?  He is 51 years old.
title: Whic foods I should give to the bladder cancer patient who has a diabetes?
